full_title: Party Like a Rockstar by Shop Boyz
title: Party Like a Rockstar
lyrics:
26 ContributorsParty Like a Rockstar Lyrics[Intro: Shop Boyz]
Yeah (P—P—P-I-T Productions)
Y-y-yeah
Y-y-yeah
Y-y-yeah, t-t-totally dude

[Chorus: Shop Boyz]
(Yeah) Party like a rock, party like a rockstar
(Y-y-yeah) Party like a rock, party like a rockstar
(Y-y-yeah) Party like a rock, party like a rockstar
(Y-y-yeah) Party like a rockstar, t-t-totally dude

[Verse 1: Fat]
I'm on a money makin' mission but I party like a rockstar (Okay)
I'm flyin' down 20 lookin' good in my hot car (Okay)
You know them hoes be at my show, grabbin' where my chain go
I'm tryna rap and hold my pants but this ho won't let my thang go
I yuu like I yuu, 'cause you know them hoes be tryin' that
Oh don't you know I fuck with fine dimes that look like Pamela
They fine and they hot, bruh, when I'm in the spot, bruh (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
I party like a rockstar

You might also like[Verse 2: Meany]
Ha, ha, party like a rock star (Woo)
Do it with the black and the white, like a cop car (Yeah)
(Whoop, whoop) Me and my band, man
On a yacht with Marilyn Manson, gettin' a tan, man (Yuu)
You know me, with a skull belt and wallet chain
Shop Boyz, rockstars, yeah, we bout to change the game (Change the game? Uh-oh) They know that I'm a star (I'm a star)
I make it rain from the center of my guitar

[Verse 3: Sheed]
As soon I came out the womb, my mama knew a star was born
Now I'm on the golf course, trippin' with the Osbournes
I seen a show with Travis Barker, Rockstar Mentality
I'm jumpin' in the crowd just to see if they will carry me
Ayy, white bitches wanna marry me, they see me they just might panic
My ice make 'em go down quick, like the Titanic
Yeah, I'm with the Shop Boyz, you know what we do
I'm surfin' screamin' "Cowabonga, totally dude" (Totally dude)
